text.text: To provide an authoritative and sincere resource on the Scripture and the Christian world view. To faithfully become that City on a Hill (Matthew 5:14) God has called his Church to be.
To give spiritual bread to the spiritually hungry. To inform and educate Believers who have a burden for Christian ministry ( personal work and public).
RESOURCE. Create an Online Resource of quality Christian Study materials.
COMMUNITY. Create an Online Community that encourages and enables Christian growth and faith. To connect teachable and sincere seekers of truth with honest and quality ministers of the Gospel.

EDUCATION. It is essential to Christian growth and to the general human condition that men know the truth. The TRUTH is Jesus Christ and the message of Salvation he brought and made possible on the cross. Knowing the TRUTH is the key our victory over sin, the flesh and the devil (John 8:32).
There are 4 main departments of work in this ministry:
Textbooks must be created and properly formatted for presentation on screen and in print. Video and audio Lessons must be recorded and connected with the text lessons.
There are a few guiding rules for the design of this ministry.
Simple. OBVIOUS focus for each section.
Fresh. Create the sense that this is NEW and UP TO DATE.
Professional. Not stiff but mature. Not necessarily 'vanilla' but
Connecting the Bible Teacher with the Bible Student.
Connecting Bible Students with other Bible Students.
Server side and client side applications and coding (PHP, DATABASE, etc.).
PREREQUISITES: Working knowledge and understanding of the four DBI ministry departments.
PREREQUISITES: Fluent grasp of and commitment to the Doctrinal standards of Deliverance Center and Deliverance Bible Institute.
PREREQUISITES: Commitment to the DBI rules of Design and grasp of modern design standards. Solid grasp on html and css.
PREREQUISITES: Fluent grasp of Email, Twitter, Facebook and other social networking sites.
PREREQUISITES: Working knowledge of PHP and MYSQL. Ability to problem solve and create efficient application solutions.
